  <script type="text/javascript">
   window.CAContent = {
            base_url: 'https://www.consumeraffairs.com',
            secure_base_url:'https://www.consumeraffairs.com'
        };
        if(!window.CAContent.user) {
            window.CAContent.user = {
                ip_address: '134.99.122.127'
            };
        }
        
        
            window.CAContent.page_type = 'homepage';
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   var ga_pagetype='Unknown', ga_category, ga_author,
                ga_variant='';
            
    ga_pagetype = 'Homepage';


            // Google Tag Manager (GTM) Data Layer
window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];

    var gtm_event = {'sessionDetails': {'internal': 'false', 'loggedIn': 'false'}, 'errorDetails': {'errorCode': '', 'errorSpecifics': '', 'errorName': ''}, 'userDetails': {'userID': ''}, 'pageDetails': {'pageType': 'homepage', 'userRegistration': 'unregistered', 'responsiveDesignBreakpoint': '', 'siteCategory': '', 'sectionName': ''}, 'event': 'dataLayer-initialized'}
    if (gtm_event.event == "dataLayer-initialized"){
        // Re-setting pageType if it's not available in original context
        // and it's available in template.
        if (gtm_event.pageDetails.pageType == "n/a" && ga_pagetype != "Unknown") {
            gtm_event.pageDetails.pageType = ga_pagetype.toLowerCase()
        }
        
        
        
    }
    window.dataLayer.push(gtm_event);
  </script>

      </path>
      <g>
       <path d="M198.9.7c0-.1-.1-.2-.2-.2h-3.1c-.1 0-.2.1-.2.2L186 24.2v.2c0 .1.1.1.2.1h2.4c.1 0 .2-.1.2-.2l2-5.1c0-.1.1-.2.3-.2h12.2c.1 0 .2.1.3.2l2 5.1c0 .1.1.2.2.2h2.4c.1 0 .2 0 .2-.1s.1-.2 0-.2L198.9.7zm-2 2.7c0-.1.1-.2.3-.2.1 0 .2.1.3.2l5.2 13.2v.3c-.1.1-.1.1-.2.1h-10.4c-.1 0-.2 0-.2-.1-.1-.1-.1-.2 0-.3l5-13.2zM224.5.6h-15c-.1 0-.2.1-.2.2v23.5c0 .1.1.2.2.2h2c.1 0 .2-.1.2-.2V13.7c0-.2.1-.3.3-.3h12.2c.1 0 .3-.1.3-.3v-1.7c0-.1-.1-.2-.3-.2H212c-.2 0-.3-.1-.3-.3V3c0-.2.1-.3.3-.3h12.5c.1 0 .2-.1.2-.3V.8c.1-.1 0-.2-.2-.2zM241.7 13.1v-1.7c0-.1-.1-.2-.2-.2h-12.3c-.2 0-.3-.1-.3-.3V3c0-.2.1-.3.3-.3h12.5c.1 0 .3-.1.3-.3V.8c0-.1-.1-.2-.3-.2h-15c-.1 0-.2.1-.2.2v23.5c0 .1.1.2.2.2h2c.1 0 .2-.1.2-.2V13.7c0-.2.1-.3.3-.3h12.3s.2-.1.2-.3zM251.8.7c0-.1-.1-.2-.2-.2h-3.1c-.1 0-.2.1-.2.2l-9.4 23.5v.2c0 .1.1.1.2.1h2.4c.1 0 .2-.1.2-.2l2-5.1c0-.1.1-.2.3-.2h12.2c.1 0 .2.1.3.2l2 5.1c0 .1.1.2.2.2h2.4c.1 0 .2 0 .2-.1s.1-.2 0-.2L251.8.7zm-2 2.7c0-.1.1-.2.3-.2.1 0 .2.1.3.2l5.2 13.2v.3c0 .1-.1.1-.2.1H245c-.1 0-.2 0-.2-.1s-.1-.2 0-.3l5-13.2zM265.5.6h-2c-.1 0-.3.1-.3.2v23.5c0 .1.1.2.3.2h2c.1 0 .2-.1.2-.2V.8c.1-.1-.1-.2-.2-.2zM279.8 14.6c2.8-.2 6.1-2.2 6.1-6.9 0-4.3-3-7.1-7.4-7.1h-9.3c-.1 0-.2.1-.2.2v23.5c0 .1.1.2.2.2h2c.1 0 .3-.1.3-.2v-9.2c0-.2.1-.3.3-.3h4.9c.1 0 .2 0 .2.1l6.1 9.5c0 .1.1.1.2.1h2.3c.1 0 .2-.1.2-.1v-.3l-6.1-9.2c-.1-.1-.1-.2 0-.3h.2zM271.4 3c0-.2.1-.3.3-.3h6.4c3 0 5.2 2 5.2 4.9 0 2.9-2.1 5-5.2 5h-6.4c-.2 0-.3-.1-.3-.3V3zM296.2 10.8c-3.1-.9-6.1-1.7-6.1-4.3 0-2.5 2.2-4.2 5.3-4.2 2.7 0 5.1.9 6.9 2.6 0 0 .1.1.2.1s.1 0 .2-.1l1.2-1.4c.1-.1.1-.2 0-.3-2.1-2-4.8-3-8.2-3-4.8 0-8.2 2.7-8.2 6.5 0 4.5 4 5.6 7.9 6.7 3.2.9 6.6 1.8 6.6 4.9 0 2.1-1.6 4.5-6.1 4.5-3.6 0-6.1-1.7-7.5-3.1-.1 0-.1-.1-.2-.1s-.1 0-.2.1l-1.2 1.5c-.1.1-.1.2 0 .3 1.5 1.6 4.3 3.5 8.9 3.5 8.1 0 8.8-5.3 8.8-6.9.1-5-4.2-6.1-8.3-7.3z">

    <!-- Home page hero section -->
    <section class="hero js-hero js-lazy-loaded">
     <div class="hero__ctnr">
      <h1>
       For life's important purchases
      </h1>
      <h4>
       Use our expert resources and verified reviews to make smart buying decisions.
      </h4>
      <form action="https://www.consumeraffairs.com/search.html" class="ca-srch js-ca-srch">
       <input aria-label="Search ConsumerAffairs.com" class="ca-srch__inp js-ca-srch__inp" name="q" placeholder="Search" type="text"/>
       <input name="cat" type="hidden" value="homepage"/>
       <button aria-label="Search" class="ca-srch__btn" data-track="Hero_Search_Submit" required="" type="submit">
        <svg height="21" viewbox="0 0 21 21" width="21" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
         <path class="ca-icon__colored-fill" d="M14.538 8.885c0-1.557-.553-2.888-1.66-3.995-1.105-1.106-2.437-1.66-3.993-1.66-1.557 0-2.888.554-3.995 1.66-1.106 1.107-1.66 2.438-1.66 3.995 0 1.556.554 2.888 1.66 3.994 1.107 1.106 2.438 1.66 3.995 1.66 1.556 0 2.888-.554 3.994-1.66 1.106-1.106 1.66-2.438 1.66-3.994zM21 19.385c0 .437-.16.816-.48 1.135-.32.32-.698.48-1.135.48a1.5 1.5 0 0 1-1.136-.48l-4.329-4.316c-1.506 1.044-3.184 1.565-5.035 1.565a8.73 8.73 0 0 1-3.452-.7 8.883 8.883 0 0 1-2.84-1.893A8.883 8.883 0 0 1 .7 12.336 8.73 8.73 0 0 1 0 8.885a8.73 8.73 0 0 1 .7-3.452 8.883 8.883 0 0 1 1.893-2.84A8.883 8.883 0 0 1 5.433.7 8.73 8.73 0 0 1 8.885 0a8.73 8.73 0 0 1 3.451.7 8.883 8.883 0 0 1 2.84 1.893 8.883 8.883 0 0 1 1.893 2.84 8.73 8.73 0 0 1 .7 3.452c0 1.85-.521 3.529-1.565 5.035l4.33 4.329c.31.311.466.69.466 1.136z" fill="#1091CC" fill-rule="evenodd">

      <span class="hero__mobl-find">
       Find a Company, Service or Category
      </span>

    <!-- Homepage Achievements -->
    <section class="ach">
     <div class="ach__ctnr">
      <div class="ach__med-ctnr">
       <div class="ach__med">
        <i class="ach__icon ach__icon-mil">
         <svg height="41" viewbox="0 0 55 41" width="55" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
          <path class="ca-icon__colored-fill" d="M34.825 29.34v.843a4.884 4.884 0 0 1-4.883 4.872H15.95l-5.083 5.077a2.131 2.131 0 0 1-2.314.454A2.122 2.122 0 0 1 7.24 38.63v-3.569H4.884A4.884 4.884 0 0 1 0 30.189V14.26a4.884 4.884 0 0 1 4.884-4.871h11.314c.667 0 1.209.54 1.209 1.206 0 .666-.542 1.206-1.21 1.206H4.878a2.469 2.469 0 0 0-2.465 2.46v15.93a2.469 2.469 0 0 0 2.465 2.46h3.566c.668 0 1.21.54 1.21 1.205v4.082L14.595 33a1.21 1.21 0 0 1 .858-.356H29.96a2.469 2.469 0 0 0 2.466-2.46v-.844a1.208 1.208 0 0 1 1.2-1.058c.61 0 1.125.454 1.2 1.058zM54.77 4.871v15.93a4.884 4.884 0 0 1-4.883 4.871H47.53v3.576a2.122 2.122 0 0 1-1.312 1.955 2.131 2.131 0 0 1-2.315-.454l-5.083-5.077H24.823a4.884 4.884 0 0 1-4.884-4.872V4.871A4.884 4.884 0 0 1 24.823 0H49.88a4.884 4.884 0 0 1 4.89 4.872zm-2.417 0a2.469 2.469 0 0 0-2.466-2.46H24.823a2.469 2.469 0 0 0-2.466 2.46v15.93a2.469 2.469 0 0 0 2.466 2.46h14.505c.322 0 .631.127.858.355l4.944 4.938v-4.088c0-.666.541-1.206 1.209-1.206h3.566a2.469 2.469 0 0 0 2.466-2.46V4.871h-.018z" fill="#3E3D3F" fill-rule="evenodd">
          </path>
         </svg>
        </i>
        <div class="ach__txt">
         <span class="ach__more">
          more than

     .top-cat__grid-box:first-child{-ms-flex-order:0;order:0}.top-cat__grid-box:nth-child(2){-ms-flex-order:1;order:1}@media (min-width:768px) and (max-width:991px){.top-cat__grid-box:nth-child(2){-ms-flex-order:2;order:2}}.top-cat__grid-box:nth-child(3){-ms-flex-order:4;order:4}@media (min-width:992px){.top-cat__grid-box:nth-child(3){-ms-flex-order:2;order:2}}@media (max-width:991px){.top-cat__grid-box:nth-child(4){-ms-flex-order:5;order:5}}@media (min-width:768px){.top-cat__grid-box:nth-child(4){-ms-flex-order:6;order:6}}@media (min-width:992px){.top-cat__grid-box:nth-child(4){-ms-flex-order:3;order:3}}.top-cat__grid-box:nth-child(10){-ms-flex-order:6;order:6}@media (min-width:768px) and (max-width:991px){.top-cat__grid-box:nth-child(10){-ms-flex-order:8;order:8}}.top-cat__grid-box:nth-child(11){-ms-flex-order:7;order:7}@media (min-width:768px) and (max-width:991px){.top-cat__grid-box:nth-child(11){-ms-flex-order:10;order:10}}.top-cat__grid-box--wide:nth-child(5){-ms-flex-order:3;order:3}@media (min-width:992px){.top-cat__grid-box--wide:nth-child(5){-ms-flex-order:4;order:4}}@media (max-width:991px){.top-cat__grid-box--wide:nth-child(6){-ms-flex-order:2;order:2}}@media (min-width:768px){.top-cat__grid-box--wide:nth-child(6){-ms-flex-order:1;order:1}}@media (min-width:992px){.top-cat__grid-box--wide:nth-child(6){-ms-flex-order:5;order:5}}.top-cat__grid-box--wide:nth-child(7){-ms-flex-order:5;order:5}@media (min-width:992px){.top-cat__grid-box--wide:nth-child(7){-ms-flex-order:8;order:8}}@media (max-width:991px){.top-cat__grid-box--wide:nth-child(8){-ms-flex-order:8;order:8}}@media (min-width:768px){.top-cat__grid-box--wide:nth-child(8){-ms-flex-order:7;order:7}}@media (min-width:992px){.top-cat__grid-box--wide:nth-child(8){-ms-flex-order:9;order:9}}.top-cat__grid-box--wide:nth-child(9){-ms-flex-order:10;order:10}@media (min-width:768px) and (max-width:991px){.top-cat__grid-box--wide:nth-child(9){margin-left:0}}

     <div class="cat-li__ctnr">
      <div class="cat-li__head">
       <h2>
        <a data-track="Categories_ViewGuides_Click" href="https://www.consumeraffairs.com/resources/">
         View our buyers guides
        </a>

        Written by experts, reviewed by consumers.
       </p>

          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.consumeraffairs.com/furniture/aaa_mattresses.html">
            Mattress Brands
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.consumeraffairs.com/finance/finance__companies.htm">
            Mortgage Lenders
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
        <div class="cat-li__box js-cat-li__box">
         <h4>
          P
         </h4>

       At ConsumerAffairs we love to hear from both consumers and brands; please never hesitate to
       <a class="ca-a" href="https://www.consumeraffairs.com/about/">
        Contact Us
       </a>
       .
      </p>

       to learn more about how we keep you protected.

       for more information.

  <script type="text/javascript">
   (function() {
    try {
        var breadcrumb = document.querySelectorAll('.breadcrumbs li');
        var brandsBtn = document.querySelector('.cat__inb-btn');
        if (!brandsBtn) {
            brandsBtn = document.querySelector('.prf__inbound-btn');
        }
        if (brandsBtn) {
            var lastBreadCrumb = breadcrumb[breadcrumb.length - 1];
            brandsBtn.href = brandsBtn.href + "?category=" + lastBreadCrumb.innerText.trim() + "&source=" + document.getElementsByTagName('h1')[0].innerText;
        }
    } catch (e) {
        
    }
})();function loadCriteo() {
		var element = document.createElement("script");
		element.src = "//static.criteo.net/js/ld/ld.js";
		document.body.appendChild(element);
		window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
		var deviceType = /iPad/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? "t" : /Mobile|iP(hone|od)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Silk/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? "m" : "d";
		window.criteo_q.push({
			event: "setAccount",
			account: 44068
		}, {
			event: "setSiteType",
			type: deviceType
		}, {
			event: "viewHome"
		});
	}
	window.addEventListener("load", loadCriteo);(function() {
var els = document.querySelectorAll("a[href='https://www.consumeraffairs.com/home-improvement/']");
for (var i = 0, l = els.length; i < l; i++) {
    els[i].href = 'https://www.consumeraffairs.com/homeowners/home_improvements.htm';
}
var els = document.querySelectorAll("a[href='https://www.consumeraffairs.com/college-career-planning/']");
for (var i = 0, l = els.length; i < l; i++) {
    els[i].href = 'https://www.consumeraffairs.com/education/';
}
})();
  </script>
  <script>
   function sailthruLoadDispatcher() {
            var sailthruScriptEventName, sailthruEvent;
            sailthruScriptEventName = 'com.consumeraffairs.sailthruLoaded';
            sailthruEvent = new CustomEvent(sailthruScriptEventName, {});
            window.dispatchEvent(sailthruEvent);
        }

        window.addEventListener('com.consumeraffairs.sailthruLoaded', function () {
            if (window.Sailthru && window.Sailthru.init) {
                window.Sailthru.init({customerId: '7dc80f0b4a2435137dda0157b1b7e458'})
            }
        });

        window.addEventListener('load', function() {
            var e = document.createElement('script');
            e.onload = sailthruLoadDispatcher;
            e.src = document.location.protocol + '//ak.sail-horizon.com/spm/spm.v1.min.js';
            e.async = true;
            document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0].appendChild(e);
        });
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   window.addEventListener('load', function() {
            try {
                newrelic.setCustomAttribute('pageDesignVersion', '2');
            } catch (e) {
                console.log('NewRelic Agent not defined');
            }
        });
  </script>
